statements: DELETE FROM Financial_Reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND participant_id = 500;
DELETE FROM Financial_Reports WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM regulatory_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM regulatory_reports WHERE report_id = 100 AND compliance_status = True;
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE compliance_status = true;
DELETE FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status = 0;
